readyToFilm.description: Complete scripts you can film right now. Based on top performers.

scripts.title: The Spanish Switch Demo

basedOn.title: I Switched To Spanish Mid Call…

scripts.script:
I switched to Spanish mid-call…

[Show phone screen with AI call in progress]

Watch what happens when I suddenly start speaking Spanish to our AI receptionist.

[Cut to call audio: You speaking English, then switching to Spanish]

AI: "Hola, ¿cómo puedo ayudarle hoy?"

[AI responds fluently in Spanish, books appointment]

No pause. No confusion. Instant language detection.

This is what sub-100ms response time looks like.

30% of patients in [area] prefer Spanish. Are you losing them?

[End frame: DM me "SPANISH" for a demo]

scripts.title: Angry Caller Challenge
scripts.script:
$5K AI Receptionist VS Angry Caller.

I'm going to try to break this AI.

[Show dialing the number]

Caller: "This is ridiculous! I've been waiting 3 weeks for my appointment and nobody called me back!"

[AI responds calmly, acknowledges frustration, offers immediate solution]

AI: "I completely understand your frustration. Let me get you scheduled right now. What day works best for you this week?"

[Caller softens, books appointment]

No hold music. No "let me transfer you." No attitude.

Just a booked appointment in 45 seconds.

This is Sync2.

scripts.title: Sub-100ms Explanation
scripts.hook: How to Achieve Sub-100ms AI Voice Response Time

basedOn.title: How to Achieve Sub-100ms AI Voice…

scripts.script:
How to achieve sub-100ms AI voice response time.

Most voice AIs have a 2-second delay. Here's why, and how to fix it.

[Visual: Timeline showing delay points]

Delay 1: Speech-to-text processing (500ms)
Delay 2: LLM thinking (800ms)
Delay 3: Text-to-speech generation (400ms)

Total: 1.7 seconds minimum.

Here's the fix:

1. Stream everything. Don't wait for complete sentences.
2. Use predictive caching for common responses.
3. Run STT and TTS on edge servers, not cloud.

Result? Sub-100ms response.

Your AI sounds like a real person, not a robot waiting to think.

[End frame: Link in bio for the full breakdown]

scripts.title: The $47K Leak
scripts.hook: A med spa paid me $15K to stop losing $47K a month

basedOn.title: A med spa paid me $15K to stop losing $47K a month

scripts.script:
A med spa paid me $15K to stop losing $47K a month.

Here's what I found:

23% of their calls went to voicemail.
Average patient value: $800.
Missed calls per month: 59.

59 × $800 = $47,200 in potential revenue. Gone.

The fix:

[Show Sync2 dashboard]

AI receptionist that answers every call in under 1 second.
Books appointments directly into their system.
Handles reschedules, cancellations, and FAQs.

Month 1 results:
- 0 missed calls
- 47 additional bookings
- $37,600 recovered revenue

ROI: 2.5x in 30 days.

This is why clinics are switching to AI.

[End frame: Free audit - link in bio]

scripts.title: 3 Ring Psychology
scripts.hook: Why patients hang up after 3 rings

basedOn.title: Why your voice AI has a 2-second delay…

scripts.script:
Why patients hang up after 3 rings.

Here's the psychology:

Ring 1-2: They're patient. Expecting an answer.
Ring 3-4: Doubt creeps in. "Are they even open?"
Ring 5+: They assume you're closed. Or don't care.

[Stat on screen]

85% of people who hang up don't call back.

They call the next clinic on Google.

Every missed call is a $200-$800 patient walking to your competitor.

The fix isn't hiring more staff.
It's answering instantly. Every time. 24/7.

That's what AI receptionists do.

[End frame: How many calls did you miss today?]
